name: Pentas (itch) (UnsuspiciousGames)
description:
A small project I worked on to get a little better with game-dev. It is a variation of tetris, where the pieces are pentominoes instead of tetrominoes. I made it in just three days.

Controls:
A, D & S to move the piece
Q &  E to rotate
R to store a piece
Space to place the piece instantly
